data.text: Is possible configure what type of database you prefer. The possible choice are:

items.content: H2: is a database file based, is used for store limited informations. Not suitable for heavy workloads or large datasets in production environments. If you have to much players i not recommend this type of database;
YAML: is a file used for store informations. If you want see your data with not to much problem and for backup is the perfect choice! Sometimes fails with to much data to update;

SqLite: is a database file based, is used for store informations. Ideal for small and medium-sized applications. SQLite is slightly slower than fully in-memory databases such as H2, but is very performant for read operations;
